text: William (Bill) Sneazwell (3 April 1906 – 14 December 1967) was a former Australian rules footballer who played for the Collingwood Football Club in the Victorian Football League (VFL). His son, Anthony (Tony) Sneazwell, is an Australian former high jumper who competed at the 1964 and 1968 Summer Olympics. == Notes == == External links == * *Bill Sneazwell's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1906 births Category:1967 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Bill Sneazwell
